t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    input()
    arr = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    s = sum(arr) - len(arr)
    print(['errorgorn', 'maomao90'][1 - s & 1])

n = int(input())
mass = 0
k = 0
for nabor in range(n):
    nabor = int(input())
    b = range(nabor)
    b = map(int, input().split())
    for a in b:
        mass += a
        k += 1
    mass -= k
    if mass % 2 == 0:
        print('maomao90')
    else:
        print('errorgorn')
    mass = 0
    k = 0

for _ in range(int(input())):
    print('maomao90' if (int(input()) - sum(list(map(int, input().split())))) % 2 == 0 else 'errorgorn')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    logs = list(map(int, input().split()))
    chopspossible = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        l = logs[i]
        chopspossible = chopspossible + l - 1
        i += 1
    if chopspossible % 2 == 1:
        print('errorgorn')
    else:
        print('maomao90')

for n in [*open(0)][2::2]:
    print(('maomao90', 'errorgorn')[sum([int(i) - 1 for i in n.split()]) % 2])

for x in [*open(0)][2::2]:
    print(('maomao90', 'errorgorn')[sum([int(i) - 1 for i in x.split()]) % 2])

for a in [*open(0)][2::2]:
    print(('maomao90', 'errorgorn')[sum([int(i) - 1 for i in a.split()]) % 2])

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    ar = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print('errorgorn' if (sum(ar) - n) % 2 == 1 else 'maomao90')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = sum([int(i) - 1 for i in input().split() if int(i) > 1])
    print('errorgorn' if a % 2 == 1 else 'maomao90')

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s = sum(map(int, input().split())) - n
    print('errorgorn' if s % 2 else 'maomao90')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    print(('maomao90', 'errorgorn')[(sum(a) - n) % 2])
